title: Healthcare Assistant
description: Assisted patients with daily living activities and supported medical staff in various tasks.
accomplishments: Assisted patients with daily living activities, including bathing, dressing, and feeding.
Monitored patient conditions and reported changes to medical staff.
Assisted with medical procedures and administered medications under supervision.
Collected and recorded patient information, such as vital signs and medical history.
Maintained a clean and safe environment for patients, adhering to health and safety regulations.
Worked closely with nurses, doctors, and other healthcare professionals to deliver high-quality patient care.
